Room.Name: Regalia Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Regalia Way, not to be confused with Regalia Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Regalia Way runs along the eastern border of the Regalia Convent, an order of women following a monotheistic approach to religion. Their mythos claim that only one god exists, which is omnipotent. By putting the fear of God into their subjects, they can manipulate them as they please in order to get whatever they desire. The fanciest buildings, ironically, are the churches, which supposedly use their alms to help the poor.
